name: Deploy Portfolio from Private Repo

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout Private Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with:
          repository: techcure/portfolio-private
          token: ${{ secrets.GHPAT }}

      - name: Deploy to Public Repo
        run: |
          mkdir public
          cp -r * public/  # Copy all files from private repo
          cd public
          rm -rf .git  # Remove git history to avoid conflicts
          git init
          git config user.name "GitHub Actions"
          git config user.email "actions@github.com"
          git add .
          git commit -m "Deploy lat
